Text:
Thanks for posting this film. I saw in the theater when it came out and really liked it. I've looked for it for a long time. A year or so ago, i found it posted either here or the one other site I use sometimes, anyway, that copy was in 4:3 screen ratio and wasn't the greatest copy as far as the over all quality. I am down loading this now, will post comment afterwards. 
I any one else knows the aspect ratio of this version/copy, pls. comment. Thanx
